[[Marla Sokoloff]] (8.10) |gender = Female}}'''Dina Tribbiani''' is one of Joey's sisters, portrayed by [[Lisa Melilli]] in season 3 and by [[Marla Sokoloff]] in season 8. Dina is the youngest of the Tribbiani Sisters. Joey described her as his smartest relative of his entire family, she took the SATS and did two years of college, but still isn't terribly bright. At one point, she asks Rachel, "Do you ever worry that you'll be walking and your baby will just slip out?". As of 2001, she had sex with her boyfriend, [[Bobby Corso]] and got pregnant. When Dina discovered she was pregnant, she went to [[Rachel Greene|Rachel]] first, asking her to help her tell [[Joey Tribbiani|Joey]]. Dina says that Joey is her favorite guy in the world and that she was more scared to tell him that she was pregnant than anyone else.[[File:Dina Tribbiani season 3.jpg|thumb|left|208px|Dina in The One Where Chandler Can't Remember Which Sister portrayed by Lisa Melilli.]]
==Trivia== In the official subtitles, Dina appears as "Deena", but in the credits, is correctly written as "Dina" [[Category:Joey's Family]] [[Category:Season 3 Characters]] [[Category:Season 8 Characters]] [[Category:Friends Characters]] [[Category:Females]] [[Category:Characters played by different actors]] [[Category:Recurring Characters]] [[Category:Mothers]] [[Category:Aunts]] [[Category:Characters]]
